title: Ep - 52 - MEGHAN EDMONDS from Real Housewives of Orange County
description:
Meghan Edmonds from Real Housewives of Orange County discusses how she was cast for the show, whether being on the show has hurt or helped her marriage, and the part of her IVF journey she wishes she kept private. Claudia Oshry from Morning Breath Podcast and the Girl With No Job Instagram helps Kate dissect the Real Housewives of New York part one reunion. Stephen McGee from Summer House reviews the BBC One’s The Great British Bake Off. 


www.loveandknuckles.com

Facebook: facebook.com/loveandknuckles

Twitter: @katecasey

Instagram: @katecaseyca
